mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User ( user_id, email, password, income_bracket, gpa, department, grade, address, spec, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{incomeBracket}, #{gpa}, #{department}, #{grade}, #{address}, #{spec}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, email AS email, password AS password, income_bracket AS incomeBracket, gpa AS gpa, department AS department, grade AS grade, address AS address, spec AS spec, created_at AS createdAt FROM User WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET password = #{password}, email = #{email}, income_bracket = #{incomeBracket}, gpa = #{gpa}, department = #{department}, grade = #{grade}, address = #{address}, spec = #{spec} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
